The varying sizes of the stripes help to keep the blind looking visually interesting, and m coastal chic just got even more fabulous with this bella frost roller blind from their harlequin additions collection.

products.title: Bella Primrose Roman Blind
products.description: This floral window blind is perfect for bringing a pretty touch plus practical shading to a kitchen or a bedroom. Using a cotton blend fabric with delicate embroidery in fresh yellow and green tones, the bella primrose roman blind is an uplifting option that is bursting with charm and will suit a traditionally inspired interior. Product id: db-rom1052 fabric colour: primrose material: 52% polyester 48% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Bella Primrose Curtain
products.description: The bella primrose curtain features a pretty floral motif that is enhanced with embroidery. This charming and delicate pattern is presented in a fresh springtime palette of green and yellow that will brighten up your interior any time of year. Fully lined, this curtain will provide excellent shading and will hang beautifully.
